high_descs: Turn around and go to the counter behind you.
Pick up the yellow spray bottle closest to the green rag, on the counter.
Turn around and go to the toilet.
Place the yellow spray bottle on the back of the toilet, to the left of the candle.
anns.task_desc: Put a spray bottle on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the white topped table.
Pick up the yellow spray bottle that's in front of you.
Turn around and take a step to your left then walk to the toilet.
Put the spray bottle on the toilet tank.
anns.task_desc: Put a spray bottle on the toilet.

high_descs: Turn around and face the white counter with the green drawers underneath.
Pink the spray bottle up from the white counter.
Turn around and face the toilet.
Put the bottle on the back of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Put a bottle on the back of the toilet.
